channel.title: CVE Feed for Ubiquiti -- UniFi Network Application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ubiquiti -- UniFi Network Application

item.title: CVE-2023-32000|2024-08-02T15:03:28.687Z -- ubiquiti -- unifi%20network%20application
item.description: A Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability found in UniFi Network (Version 7.3.83 and earlier) allows a malicious actor with Site Administrator credentials to escalate privileges by persuading an Administrator to visit a malicious web page.
